com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby

Class DerbyDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
      • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.AbstractDatabase
        • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.AbstractSQLDatabase
          • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.db.derby.DerbyDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database, SQLDatabase, com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server

    public final class DerbyDatabase
extends AbstractSQLDatabase
    Implements support for in-memory Apache Derby databases.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

      • stop

        public void stop(com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger)
        Shutdown the in-memory Apache Derby database by opening a connection with drop=true. If successful this will cause a SQL exception with a SQL State of 08006 and a vendor specific error code of 45000.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
        Overrides:
        stop in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
